remarks: Lemma 4 for ~ lindslinindsimp2 .  (Contributed by AV, 25-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
lindslinind.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) $.

lindslinind.y $e |- Y = ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( f ` x ) ) $.
lindslinind.g $e |- G = ( f |` ( S \ { x } ) ) $.
lindslinindimp2lem4 $p |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S ) /\ ( f e. ( B ^m S ) /\ f finSupp .0. /\ ( f ( linC ` M ) S ) = Z ) ) -> ( M gsum ( y e. ( S \ { x } ) |-> ( ( f ` y ) ( .s ` M ) y ) ) ) = ( Y ( .s ` M ) x ) ) $.
$d .0. f x y $.

$d G y $.
$d M f y $.
